H0.text: Which Italian City is the setting of Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet'. Florence

H1.text: Which Italian City is the setting of Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet'. Milan

H2.text: Which Italian City is the setting of Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet'. Naples

H3.text: Which Italian City is the setting of Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet'. VERONA

A4.text: The play, set in Verona, Italy, begins with a street brawl between Montague and Capulet servants...

A5.text: The earliest known version of the Romeo and Juliet tale... sets the story in Siena...
